dicomNetworkConnectionReference.title: Network Connection Reference
dicomNetworkConnectionReference.description: The JSON Pointers to the Network Connection objects used by this Audit Logger

dcmAuditRecordRepositoryDeviceName.title: Audit Record Repository Device Name
dcmAuditRecordRepositoryDeviceName.description: Device Name of Audit Record Repository to which Audit Messages are sent

dcmAuditSourceID.title: Source ID
dcmAuditSourceID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Source ID; device name if absent

dcmAuditEnterpriseSiteID.title: Enterprise Site ID
dcmAuditEnterpriseSiteID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Enterprise Site ID; value 'dicomInstitutionName' is replaced by the institution name of the DICOM device

dcmAuditSourceTypeCode.title: Source Type Code
dcmAuditSourceTypeCode.description: RFC 3881 Audit Source Type Code; value 'dicomPrimaryDeviceType' is replaced by the primary type of the DICOM device

dcmAuditFacility.title: Syslog Facility
dcmAuditFacility.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Facility value of audit message: 0-23; 10 (authpriv) if absent

dcmAuditSuccessSeverity.title: Syslog Severity - Success
dcmAuditSuccessSeverity.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Severity of audit message with Event Outcome Indicator 0 (Success); 5 (notice) if absent

dcmAuditMinorFailureSeverity.title: Syslog Severity - Failure
dcmAuditMinorFailureSeverity.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Severity of audit message with Event Outcome Indicator 4 (Minor failure); 4 (warning) if absent

dcmAuditSeriousFailureSeverity.title: Syslog Severity - Failure
dcmAuditSeriousFailureSeverity.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Severity of audit message with Event Outcome Indicator 8 (Serious failure); 3 (err) if absent

dcmAuditMajorFailureSeverity.title: Syslog Severity - Major
dcmAuditMajorFailureSeverity.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Severity of audit message with Event Outcome Indicator 12 (Major failure); 2 (crit) if absent

dcmAuditApplicationName.title: Syslog Application Name
dcmAuditApplicationName.description: RFC 5424 Syslog APP-NAME of audit message; Audit Source ID if absent

dcmAuditMessageID.title: Syslog Message ID
dcmAuditMessageID.description: RFC 5424 Syslog MSGID of audit message; DICOM+RFC3881 if absent

dcmAuditMessageEncoding.title: Message Encoding
dcmAuditMessageEncoding.description: Character encoding of RFC 5424 Syslog MSG part of audit message; UTF-8 if absent

dcmAuditMessageBOM.title: Message BOM
dcmAuditMessageBOM.description: Enable/disable Unicode BOM prefix of RFC 5424 Syslog MSG part of audit message; include BOM if absent

dcmAuditTimestampInUTC.title: Timestamp in UTC
dcmAuditTimestampInUTC.description: Specify if RFC 5424 Syslog TIMESTAMP and the Event Date/Time of the audit message are specified in Coordinated Universal Time or in Local Time; use Local Time zone if absent

dcmAuditMessageFormatXML.title: Message Format XML
dcmAuditMessageFormatXML.description: Specify whether or not the XML audit message is formatted with linefeeds and indentation; disabled if absent

dcmAuditMessageSchemaURI.title: Message Schema URI
dcmAuditMessageSchemaURI.description: URI of DICOM Audit Message Schema referenced in audit message

dcmAuditIncludeInstanceUID.title: Include Instance UIDs
dcmAuditIncludeInstanceUID.description: Indicates if Audit Log Message should contain optional Instance UIDs

dcmAuditLoggerSpoolDirectoryURI.title: Spool Directory URI
dcmAuditLoggerSpoolDirectoryURI.description: URI of spool directory used to store messages which could not delivered to the record repository; use system temporary directory if absent

dcmAuditLoggerRetryInterval.title: Retry Interval
dcmAuditLoggerRetryInterval.description: Retry interval in s to re-sent messages which could not delivered to the record repository; do no retry to re-sent messages if absent

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the Audit Logger is installed on network. If not present, information about the installed status of the Audit Logger is inherited from the device

cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the Audit Suppress Criteria

dcmAuditEventID.title: Audit Event ID
dcmAuditEventID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Event ID code and codeSystemName in format (CV, CSD, "CM")

dcmAuditEventTypeCode.title: Audit Event Type Code
dcmAuditEventTypeCode.description: RFC 3881 Audit Event Type code in format (CV, CSD, "CM")

dcmAuditEventActionCode.title: Event Action Code
dcmAuditEventActionCode.description: RFC 3881 Audit Event Action Type code. Enumerated values: C, R, U, D, E

dcmAuditEventOutcomeIndicator.title: Event Outcome Indicator
dcmAuditEventOutcomeIndicator.description: RFC 3881 Audit Event Outcome Indicator. Enumerated values: 0, 4, 8, 12

dcmAuditUserID.title: User ID
dcmAuditUserID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Active Participant User ID

dcmAuditAlternativeUserID.title: Alternative User ID
dcmAuditAlternativeUserID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Active Participant Alternative User ID

dcmAuditUserRoleIDCode.title: User Role ID Code
dcmAuditUserRoleIDCode.description: RFC 3881 Audit Active Participant User Role ID code in format (CV, CSD, "CM")

dcmAuditNetworkAccessPointID.title: Network Access Point ID
dcmAuditNetworkAccessPointID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Active Participant Network Access Point ID

dcmAuditUserIsRequestor.title: User is Requestor
dcmAuditUserIsRequestor.description: Indicates if Active Participant is initiator/requestor of the Audit Event as specified by RFC 3881
